doc.name: CSPBuffer
doc.description: A single channel buffer. This actor is the canonical example of how to use a CDO construct. It is parameterized by the Parameter "depth", which controls how many Tokens can be stored in this buffer. The default depth of the buffer is 1. The buffer depth is set upon calling the fire method. The fire() method does not return until a TerminateProcessException is thrown.
doc.author: Neil Smyth
doc.port: The input port for this actor.
The output port for this actor.
doc.property: The Parameter storing the depth of the buffer.
